scripts.deploy: cp src/pioneer_demo -R ../web2py/applications && cp src/bootstrap_template -R ../web2py/applications && cp src/bootstrap_tutorial -R ../web2py/applications
scripts.release: cd src && tar --exclude='pioneer_demo/errors/*' --exclude='pioneer_demo/session/*' -czvf web2py.app.pioneer_demo.w2p pioneer_demo && mv -f web2py.app.pioneer_demo.w2p releases
